events.description: A riot is defined by acts of collective violence. While peaceful protests may lead to riots, the peaceful protests themselves are not within the scope of KAIROS. The basic nature of a riot is unplanned and spontaneous, arising in a haphazard manner with the assembling of a crowd that turns violent and challenge the normative social order.
events.name: Riot Event
